code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={movies:[]};var movieSlice=createSlice({name:"movie",initialState:initialState,reducers:{setMovies:function setMovies(state,action){state.movies=action.payload;}}});var setMovies=movieSlice.actions.setMovies;export{setMovies};export var selectMovies=function selectMovies(state){return state.movie.movies;};export default movieSlice.reducer;
